verbs.description: [ARG0: Robert DeNiro] [V: hates] [ARG1: Donald Trump] . DeNiro did an impassioned commercial spot during the campaign where he called Trump “ a pig , a dog , a punk , a con ” and various other epithets . Since then he has called Trump a fucking idiot and a fucking fool . Added to ...
